Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=100.0, regions=[(0, 
    2, 0, 2), (2, 3, 0, 3)], row_slope=-1.0)
image = np.array([[10.0, 10.0, 10.0], [2.0, 2.0, 2.0], [8.0, 12.0, 10.0]])
mask = msk.Mask.empty_for_shape(shape=(3, 3))
ci_pre_cti = ci_data.ci_pre_cti_from_ci_pattern_geometry_image_and_mask(mask
    =mask, ci_pattern=pattern, image=image)
pattern_ci_pre_cti = pattern.ci_pre_cti_from_ci_image_and_mask(image, mask)
assert (ci_pre_cti == pattern_ci_pre_cti).all()
